# WTF am I playing?

<a href="https://gitlab.com/krmax44/playing.wtf/pipelines" title="As Github CI + Pages is poo poo, I'm using Gitlab CI"><img src="https://img.shields.io/gitlab/pipeline/krmax44/playing.wtf" alt="Build status"></a>
<a href="https://codecov.io/gh/krmax44/playing.wtf" title="Code coverage report"><img src="https://img.shields.io/codecov/c/gh/krmax44/playing.wtf" alt="Coverage"></a>
<a href="https://playing.wtf" title="Go to playing.wtf"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/url-playing.wtf-blue?logo=data:image/png;base64," alt="playing.wtf badge"></a>
<img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/cool%20domain-heck%20yea-success" alt="Cool domain badge">

Input notes on a virtual keyboard or fretboard (or soon via MIDI) and get the note names, intervals and chords.
